title: Dreams of Hope: Walking with God
description: Claudine has written a wonderful book. Her words reach your heart with the deep, all-encompassing love of Jesus who has comforted her in the deepest valleys of her life. Everyone is able to find deep peace and rest for life! A book that brings healing to your heart - it speaks of the power of forgiveness and love.Everyone is able to find deep peace and rest for life!Do you need vitamins for your soul? Here they are!
author: Claudine Callebaut
